note:
Posting in solidarity with Palestine, Lebanon, and West Asia. I've migrated my profile from @prasoon because of its complicity in promoting the genocide, and silencing the voices of resistance.

Here to build connections with fellow conscientious people, who do not need convincing that Colonial forces must be thwarted, that resistance against occupiers is legitimate.

Trolls, Zionists, Nazis, HIndutva gang, far-Right profiles would be blocked. "Fence sitters" would be blocked.
